thread.title: Paul Pogba, Bastian Schweinsteiger and Jose Mourinho all on Manchester United plane to St Etienne… but where’s Luke Shaw?
thread.title_full: Paul Pogba, Bastian Schweinsteiger and Jose Mourinho all on Manchester United plane to St Etienne… but where’s Luke Shaw?

author: jhutchinson
title: Paul Pogba, Bastian Schweinsteiger and Jose Mourinho all on Manchester United plane to St Etienne… but where’s Luke Shaw?
text:
EFL LUKE WHO'S DROPPED Paul Pogba, Bastian Schweinsteiger and Jose Mourinho all on Manchester United plane to St Etienne… but where’s Luke Shaw? 
The ex-Southampton full-back was on the bench for the FA Cup win at Blackburn - but has been cast aside once again Pictured
